This is the website of the [Introduction to Statistical Learning]{.blue} course of the
Bachelor’s Degree Programme in Philosophy, International and Economic Studies, Ca' Foscari University of Venice.

## Teaching material

#### Required

- Gareth, J., D. Witten, T. Hastie, and R. Tibshirani. 2021. [*An Introduction to Statistical Learning with Applications in R*](https://www.statlearning.com/) (Second Edition). New York: Springer.

#### Optional

- Azzalini, A., and B. Scarpa. 2013. [*Data Analysis and Data Mining: an Introduction*](http://azzalini.stat.unipd.it/Book-DM/). Oxford University Press.

- Gareth, J., D. Witten, T. Hastie, R. Tibshirani and J. Taylor. 2023. [*An Introduction to Statistical Learning with Applications in Python*](https://www.statlearning.com/). New York: Springer.
